overview: When the demented Jozias needs to get help for his wife, he ends up in an odyssey that only brings him further away from his home and from himself. Just as he is lost in the middle of a vast forest, he meets an armed young lady. Their encounter is the start of an unexpected journey.
tagline: Jozias is zichzelf niet meer en vergeet alles. De wereld is hem vreemd geworden.
title: Over een Pastoor op Regenlaarzen
